summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to energy-efficiency and energy conservation; amending Section 22.700.010 Seattle Municipal Code ("SMC") to adopt by reference the 1994 Washington State Energy Code (WAC 51-11) and repeal the Model Energy Code, 1989 Edition and amendments thereto; amending Sections 1144, 1150, 1161, 1162, 1311.6, 1323, 1402, 1411.2, 1412.6, 1414.1, 1421, 1436, 1438 and Tables 13-1 and 15-1; and adding new Sections 1144.1, 1144.2, 1144.3, 1144.4, 1421.1, 1431.2, 1438.1 and 1438.2.
